display_long_description:
# The Frontier is calling.

Conquer the unforgiving depths of a treacherous mine, avoiding traps, and collecting rare artifacts.

Fortune on the Frontier is an Action + Adventure VR Platformer where you move your body to run, climb, and swing to victory, no teleporting required.

In this sneak-peak demo of the single player campaign, test your adventuring skills with three levels of difficulty, collect all the hidden treasures, and beat your best times on your local leaderboard.

# __________________________________________
# Plans for the Future

Fortune on the Frontier is currently in development. The full game will include:

**Asymmetrical Multiplayer (VR + Smart Devices):** Compete against fellow VR adventurers in an exciting race to claim your prize. Play with your non-VR friends where they will craft the adventure, take control of four unique animals, and trigger devastating traps using their smartphone or tablet. 

**Single Player Campaign:** Immerse yourself in a single-player campaign that will take you through the story of a once bustling frontier town. Keep your wits sharp as nature itself seeks to bring your adventure to a sudden, dramatic end.  Explore all branching paths to find dozens of unique treasures and unravel the mystery of King & Keegstra mine. 

If you like what you see, please consider joining our Discord or following High Level Studios on social media for the latest project updates.
